text: To view this information to help understand the full picture, visit https://t.co/72uSkl2FXy and select COVD-19 Dashboard. If you are viewing on a mobile device, select “Mobile Site” in the yellow box at the top left for improved accessibility of the information.

urls.title: COVID-19 Outbreak | Health & Senior Services
urls.description: On April 1, 2022, Missouri began recognizing COVID-19 as endemic in our state. Endemic does not mean the end of COVID-19. In public health, the term endemic refers to the constant presence of a disease within a population or geographic area. Over the last two years in Missouri’s emergency response, we expanded capabilities in areas of PPE, testing, vaccinations, hospital capacity, data collection and treatments for COVID-19 that allows us to move to our next phase of recovery. Interactive, printable
